Foresight.name: FORESIGHT PREP
Foresight.description: At the start of combat, gain 1 <c=status>FORESIGHT DRAW</c>.

Directive.name: Directive
Directive.description: Choose a card from draw pile and add it to your hand.
Directive.descA: Choose a card from draw pile and add it to your hand.
Directive.descB: Choose 2 cards from draw pile and add it to your hand.

Vulnerability.name: Personal Antithesis
Vulnerability.description: Part ahead of cockpit becomes <c=damage>Weak</c>, or likewise <c=damage>Brittle</c>.

LeadByExample.name: Lead by Example
LeadByExample.description:
Attack for <c=damage>3</c> damage.
Choose a card in your hand to play for free.

Hindsight.name: Hindsight
Hindsight.description: Restore two discarded cards. Gain 1 <c=status>FORESIGHT DRAW</c>.
Hindsight.descA: Restore two discarded cards. Gain 1 <c=status>FORESIGHT DRAW</c>.
Hindsight.descB: Restore four discarded cards. Gain 1 <c=status>FORESIGHT DRAW</c>.

Hypercognition.name: Hypercognition
Hypercognition.description: Add 3 <c=cardtrait>disc, temp, s. use</c> Recall Knowledge to deck. Gain 1 <c=status>F. DRAW</c>.
Hypercognition.descA: Add 3 <c=cardtrait>disc, temp, s. use</c> Recall Knowledge to deck. Gain 1 <c=status>F. DRAW</c>.
Hypercognition.descB: Add 6 <c=cardtrait>disc, temp, s. use</c> Recall Knowledge to deck. Gain 1 <c=status>F. DRAW</c>.

Refocus.name: Refocus
Refocus.description:
Restore exhaust to discard pile.
Gain 1 <c=status>FORESIGHT DRAW</c>.
Refocus.descA:
Restore exhaust to discard pile.
Gain 1 <c=status>FORESIGHT DRAW</c>.
Refocus.descB:
Restore exhaust to discard to draw pile.
Gain 1 <c=status>F. DRAW</c>.

SweetrollEXE.name: Sweetroll.EXE
SweetrollEXE.description: Add 1 of 2 <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=5F00BC>SWEETROLL</c> cards to your hand.
SweetrollEXE.descA: Add 1 of 2 <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=5F00BC>SWEETROLL</c> cards to your hand.
SweetrollEXE.descB: Add 1 of 3 <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=5F00BC>SWEETROLL</c> cards to your hand.

ForesightDraw.name: Foresight Draw
ForesightDraw.description: The next time you draw a card, choose one to put into your hand instead.

AkashicDownload.name: Akashic Download
AkashicDownload.description: At start of turn, perform {0} <c=status>FORESIGHT DRAW</c>.
